migraine.description: A neurological condition causing severe headaches, nausea, and light sensitivity.
migraine.suggested_action: Rest in a dark room and take migraine medication if prescribed.

flu.description: A contagious viral infection causing fever, body aches, and fatigue.
flu.suggested_action: Stay home, rest, and drink fluids. See a doctor if symptoms worsen.

cold.description: A common viral infection causing sneezing, coughing, and mild fatigue.
cold.suggested_action: Rest and drink plenty of fluids.

anemia.description: A condition where you lack enough healthy red blood cells to carry oxygen.
anemia.suggested_action: See a healthcare provider for a blood test and treatment options.
